description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924; head and shoulders of a man in a garment with an open collar and two buttons; face is shaded with dark horizontal lines running across the forehead, the left eye area, and the right side of the face
inscription: LL of sheet, in pencil: Mappe \"das Gesicht\" (9 Blattes) | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert E 159 | LR of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck
portfolio: From Plate 5 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté
title: Dark Face (Self-Portrait), Plate 5 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
